result.eng: I needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ga: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.orig: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.html: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deoċ uaim aċ ḃí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.

result.eng: I needed to have it under control.
result.ga: Theastaigh uaim é a bheith faoi smacht agam
result.orig: Theastaigh uaim é a bheith faoi smacht agam
result.html: Theastaigh uaim é a bheith faoi smacht agamI needed to have it under control.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeastaiġ uaim é a ḃeiṫ faoi smaċt agamI needed to have it under control.

result.ga: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíth
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíth
result.html: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíthI know what is needed.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam cad atá de ḋíṫI know what is needed.

result.eng: No imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ga: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.orig: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.html: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ponchtml: Níl saṁlaíoċt ar biṫ ag teastáil ċun é seo a ṫuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
